sentences.sContent: ...the suppression of a number of documents which were very germane to the case.
sentences.sCn: ...对几份与本案密切相关的文件的隐瞒。

synos.tran: 有密切关系的；贴切的；恰当的

remMethod.val: 这次的成果与德国 (Germany) 有密切关系 (germane)

trans.tranCn: 有密切关系的； 恰当的
trans.tranOther: an idea, remark etc that is germane to something is related to it in an important and suitable way
